analysis.description:
MonethaGateway.acceptPayment (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#288-303) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- monethaVault.transfer(_monethaFee) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#301)

MerchantWallet.doWithdrawal (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#664-666) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#666)

PaymentProcessor.processPayment (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1001-1046) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- monethaGateway.acceptPayment.value(orders[_orderId].price)(fundAddress,orders[_orderId].fee) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1035-1036)
	- monethaGateway.acceptPayment.value(orders[_orderId].price)(merchantWallet,orders[_orderId].fee) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1038-1042)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#212-244) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#222-225)

SafeDestructible.destroy (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#520-523) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)

PaymentProcessor.secureTokenPay (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#878-893) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(order.tokenAddress).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),order.price) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#888-892)

Reentrancy in PaymentProcessor.constructor (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#813-825):
	External calls:
	- setMerchantWallet(_merchantWallet) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#823-824)
	- setMerchantDealsHistory(_merchantHistory) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#824-825)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- merchantHistory (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#824-825)

Reentrancy in PaymentProcessor.setMerchantDealsHistory (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1072-1082):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_merchantHistory.merchantIdHash() == merchantIdHash) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1079-1080)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- merchantHistory (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1080-1081)

Reentrancy in PaymentProcessor.setMerchantWallet (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1058-1064):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_newWallet.merchantIdHash() == merchantIdHash) (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1060-1062)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- merchantWallet (/unique_chucks/18/0x840507196d587f9fb0f9f345267a967d52a998ee.sol#1063)
